attributes.action: RSE curriculum should not be compulsory
attributes.additional_details: Parents have the right to chose what their children are being taught and they have the freedom of opinion, thought and speech, children shouldn’t be brainwashed from government’s beliefs.Forcing an opinion into young children’s minds is violating our freedom of opinion. Parents should be allowed to choose if they want their children to take part in the RSE, when they are forced to allow their own children to take part it Dosent really reflect that UK citizens have the freedom of opinion.
attributes.background: RSE forces children at a young age (at 4 years) to accept the idea of different sexualities, not only does it strip away their innocence however it is completely disrespectful to the rules of many major religions and forces children to accept the idea although their religion Dosent allow this.
